aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.firstParagraph: OOO Spetsresurs is a dynamically developing cable plant. Our main specialization is the production of fire-resistant cable for fire protection systems. We also manufacture heating wire (concrete heating), telephony, video surveillance.
aboutUs.secondParagraph: We have assembled a team of qualified professionals in the electrical goods market to implement a key mission: saving people's lives by manufacturing high-tech and environmentally friendly cable and wire products that meet all operating and safety standards.
aboutUs.thirdParagraph: The main principles of the company are: honest business practices, an individual approach to each client, affordable cable prices, and control over every stage of production.
aboutUs.fourthParagraph: Caring about the quality of our products, we purchase raw materials only from large suppliers of copper, steel, and plastic.
aboutUs.fifthParagraph: Our own laboratory and multi-stage quality control ensure that the products comply with GOST standards.
